Html: I'm having trouble understanding why Brilliant Lionseye (+10 Int.) is outweighing Potent Pyrestone (+5 Crit / +6 Spell Power) on virtually every build option.  Arcane I can understand this result due to the nature of Arcane talents, but as fire the increase in crit via intellect certainly doesn't make up for the difference and it's undoubtedly not mana efficiency.  Can anyone explain or is this bugged?
Int isn't good for any build currently. The only time int has value is if you run oom. Make sure you have Replenishment and/or JoW enabled under buffs and set appropriate fight duration.
